author: bencomic

right.text: And besides, you're just showing the world how utterly immature you are. You would reply that I was childlike, or immature.

left.text: XD how pathetic you are. You're just like a common grade school bully; you can dish it out, but you can't take it. How utterly predictable. I don't take well to wannabe tyrants, however.

right.text: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have some things I must tend to, so I bid you adieu.

left.text: When I do such things, there is a reason. Either I'm messing with your mind,or simply ignorant on the matter. Maybe you should rethink your life.

title: how to win an argument, jazzy style
